duties_responsibilities.duty: Interact with case teams, creditors, vendors, and customers to collect and communicate case information.
Research and understand general case information from public case websites for effective communication with callers.
Provide support to creditors by accurately responding to inquiries received via phone, email, chat, or mail.
Handle inbound and outbound calls, de-escalate situations, and guide callers through troubleshooting and filing claims.
Collaborate in a team environment to improve communication services and maintain call logs for reporting purposes.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or GED certificate required; Bachelor’s Degree preferred
Call center and customer service experience preferred
